trans-unit.source: Represents a button that enables the user to switch between the different <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer"></xref> modes within the property grid .
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> class.

Determines what type of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode"></xref> to display upon receipt of a <xref href="System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs"></xref> event.

Checks whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty"></xref> has changed (or gained or lost) its owning <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer"></xref> and if that is <xref href="System.Boolean.True"></xref>, sets up the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode"></xref> to be the mode to switch to.

Gets a value that, when <xref href="System.Boolean.True"></xref>, means that the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode"></xref> will be calculated automatically to match the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode"></xref> of the owning <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer"></xref>.
Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode"></xref> property.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> will switch automatically to the edit mode of its <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.

Registers the dependency property which, when <xref href="System.Boolean.True"></xref>, means that the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode"></xref> will be calculated automatically to match the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode"></xref> of the owning <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer"></xref>.
Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode"></xref> property.
The edit mode to switch to when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> is clicked.
Registers the dependency property that gets or sets the targeted mode when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> is clicked.
